name: Prism (itch) (widachugo, PRESS --ART BUTTON)
description:
Prism is a puzzle game in side view using the principle of reflection of light.

The player can use his prism to interact with the light and therefore reflect the light. He can also rotate the prism for direct the light and change the angle of reflexion.

The light can be also used to kill different enemies in the game or for stuns enemies.

The game is playable with Keyboard and Controller.
